article_title: Natural Bridge Zoo to remain closed, judge says
article_text:
Print Subscriber Access (non 7-day)

CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS: Add unlimited access to our digital content, including roanoke.com and our eTimes, to your current print subscription for just $1.99 for the first month.

The $1.99 will be billed to your credit card immediately by PayPalPro. After the first month, your total susbscription price will be $15.47 per month.

og.description: LEXINGTON — The Natural Bridge Zoo will remain closed for the foreseeable future, after a last-ditch effort failed Friday when a judge declined to restore its state permit.
